advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored

Class RoomManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.RoomManager

  • public class RoomManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The room manager class manages all the room in the game and gives methods to allow access to room in the game.
    Author:
    dja33

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addRoom(Room room)
      Add a room to the room manager, if the room already exists then it won't be added
      void checkIntegrity()
      Check integrity of all rooms currently loaded The integrity of each room is based on whether it has at least one exit

                    throws MalformedXMLException
